items.label: I did not receive the Notice to owner/Penalty charge notice
items.name: statement_non_london_borough_no_penalty_charge_notice

items.label: I made representations about the penalty charge to the enforcing authority concerned within 28 days of the service of the notice to owner, but did not receive a rejection notice
items.name: statement_non_london_borough_no_rejection_notice

items.label: I appealed to an adjudicator against the Charging Authority's decision to reject my representation, within 28 days of service of the rejection notice, but have had no response to my appeal
items.name: statement_non_london_borough_no_appeal_response

items.label: I appealed to an adjudicator against the Charging Authority's decision to reject my representation, within 28 days of service of the rejection notice, but the appeal had not been determined by the time the charge certificate had been served.
items.name: statement_non_london_borough_appeal_not_determined

items.label: I appealed to an adjudicator against the Charging Authority's decision to reject my representation, and the appeal was determined in my favour.
items.name: statement_non_london_borough_won_appeal

items.label: The penalty charge has been paid in full
items.name: statement_non_london_borough_charge_paid
